Shockwave/Injector/Manterror/Counter Punch/Double Punch/Ramhorn:



Shockwave transformed in the air, going to his ray gun mode, floating in mid 
air.  Bringing the "barrel" to face downwards, the weapon fired a plasma 
burst at the middle of the battle.

---

Injector went flying back from the combined shots of Striker, and the missile 
debris from Shockwave.

---

Counter Punch went slamming through a tree, hitting the ground from Ramulus' 
shots.

---

Double Punch saw the newcomers.  "Slag!" he yelled, Beeline diving, the 
missile explosions sending it slamming into a tree.  Raising both pinches, 
Double Punch fired two missiles at Striker's side, and two missiles at 
Ultracon.

---

Manterror returned, seeing Ramulus.  "HOLY SLAG!  IMPOSSIBLE!" he screamed, 
leaping from the foilage, attempting to tackle the person he had "bravely" 
killed a while back.  

---

Ramhorn got up, firing two laser blasts from his pistol at Mosquitor's back.
